forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 57. Southwest wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 73. West southwest wind 7 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
As the city breathes through the night, the remnants of warmth linger gently in the air, kissing the coolness of early morning. The horizon is mostly clear, revealing a tranquil sky that promises a delightful Saturday ahead. Temperatures will embrace the mid-70s, with a slight breeze from the west that will whisper through the streets, invigorating those who venture out. While the fog may have sought refuge along the coastal edges, the heart of Downtown San Francisco revels in clarity, inviting a day filled with sunlit possibilities.

For those who choose to navigate the city today, layered attire will be your wise companion; consider a light jacket for the brisk wind while embracing the sun’s warmth as it graces the afternoon. A stroll through the vibrant streets is calling, with the lure of art-filled alleyways and quiet coffee shops beckoning those looking to savor a leisurely morning. Besides the usual tourist paths, perhaps indulge in the understated charm of a quiet park or an open air market: perfect backdrops against which to soak in the ethos of this dynamic city.
